function transferFrom(

        address _from, 

        address _to, 

        uint256 _value) public returns (bool success) 

    {

        assert(_to!=address(this) && 

                !isTransPaused &&

                balances[msg.sender] >= _value &&

                balances[_to] + _value > balances[_to] &&

                allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _value

        );

        

        balances[_to] += _value;//接收账户增加token数量_value //FP-Integer Overflow and Underflow

        balances[_from] -= _value; //支出账户_from减去token数量_value //FP-Integer Overflow and Underflow

        allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _value;//消息发送者可以从账户_from中转出的数量减少_value //FP-Integer Overflow and Underflow

        if(_from==owner){

			emit Transfer(address(this), _to, _value);//触发转币交易事件

		}else{

			emit Transfer(_from, _to, _value);//触发转币交易事件

		}

        return true;

    }
